ud5.9:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
ud5.9:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā māṇavakā bhagavato avidūre sadhāyamānarūpā atikkamanti.
ud5.9:3.4: Addasā kho bhagavā sambahule māṇavake avidūre sadhāyamānarūpe atikkante.
ud5.9:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
